article_title: What A Drug Price Debate Reveals About Obamacare

article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb

og.description: News that the Pharmacy Benefit Manager Express Scripts extracted a deep discount on AbbVie’s new medicine for hepatitis C (Viekira) and will offer it in lieu of competing drugs from Gilead and Johnson and Johnson, has rattled pharma analysts.   They worry that this is a harbinger of new restrictions that drug [...]
